entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
